User input: "man of doors"

I am Doorman, an automated question answer bot designed to give well written answers using large language. I was developed by Mike Doan and Mateo Sanabria at TReNDS in 2023 and function using large language.
Hello there
I'm sorry, could you provide more clarifying information?
User input: "hey Doorman, where's the center wiki"
The wiki is located at the following address: https://trendscenter.github.io/wiki/
User input: "How to get reimbursed for the book I bought"

Please complete and submit a TReNDS Payment Request form to ops@trendscenter.org. The Payment Request Form is in the https://sites.google.com/gsu.edu/trends-center-intranet/purchasing-and-travel  Purchasing and Travel section of TReNDS Intranet with instructions included in the download. All payment requests should be made within 30 days of the receipt being submitted for reimbursements. It is important to make sure you submit your request by downloading the most recent version of the form available on the TReNDS Intranet to assure the use of accurate account information.

User input: "How do I find the intranet"

You must use your GSU email and password when you are logging into any of our TReNDS Google accounts. TReNDS does not have access to G-Mail, which can make logging in challenging. We recommend logging in here: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/my-drive  first with your GSU credentials and then trying to navigate to the intranet

User input: "Where is the map of the TReNDS center"

Step 1: Use your GSU CampusID and Password to login to https://sfi.gsu.edu         
Step 2: Under the My Disclosure tab scroll down to the Annual Disclosure section. Please note that if you are an employee in the TReNDS Department, your division is URSA and your Department is TReNDS. Please do not indicate Psychology as your department. Contact hr@trendscenter.org if you have questions regarding your department.
Step 3: Select Yes for Annual Disclosure and answer the corresponding questions that appear. 
Step 4: Select the Save Annual Disclosure button at the bottom of this section to save your responses.
Step 5: Make any other changes to your disclosure form that are needed.         
Step 6: Also click the Update button at the bottom of the form to save all changes and submit your disclosure.  
Please use the following How-To Guide for additional guidance: How to Complete an Annual Disclosure.

User input: "Hi, does anyone know how to find a mistakenly deleted folder in the cluster?"
I'm sorry, could you provide more clarifying information?
User input: "Hi, does anyone know how to find a mistakenly deleted folder in the cluster?"

Go to the relevant  users* folder. Run the id  command and note yours: msalman@arctrdlogin001:/data/users1$ id uid=580391(msalman) ... Look for the corresponding .Trash* folder: msalman@arctrdlogin001:/data/users1$ ls ./.Trash-580391 -lR ./.Trash-580391: total 8 drwx------ 2 msalman domain users 4096 Oct 13  2022 files drwx------ 2 msalman domain users 4096 Oct 13  2022 info

User input: "how do I print things"

It is only possible to print from Mac or Windows. Instructions for Mac  To connect to the printer go to http://support.ricoh.com/bb/html/dr_ut_e/rc3/model/imc4500/imc4500.htm. Install the drivers for a Ricoh IM C4500 for your OS. Then add the machine manually. The address is URS6418RIC4500.prt.gsu.edu. When adding, change the default IPP protocol to LPD.  Instructions for PC  Go to http://support.ricoh.com/bb/html/dr_ut_e/rc3/model/imc4500/imc4500.htm  Download the top option, PCL 6 Drive.  Then unzip that file and select the Driver Web Installer in the folder of the same name. That takes you through the process. You should not need an IP, but if you do it is 10.253.208.29.
